events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer role. Thank you for your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been reviewed and moved to the Engineering cluster for the software engineer position based on your skills and experience.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your case to guide you through the upcoming recruitment steps.
We conducted your initial screening interview focusing on your software development background and technical skills.
Thank you for the detailed responses during the initial screening. Your enthusiasm for engineering projects is evident.
The technical interview has been scheduled for April 7th. It will include a coding challenge and system design discussion.
